abstract: Mathew Martoma, the former SAC Capital Advisors portfolio manager facing insider trading charges, has switched lawyers, replacing Charles A. Stillman with Richard M. Strassberg of Goodwin Procter.
snippet: Mathew Martoma, the former SAC Capital Advisors portfolio manager facing insider trading charges, has switched lawyers, replacing Charles A. Stillman with Richard M. Strassberg of Goodwin Procter.
lead_paragraph: Mathew Martoma, the former SAC Capital Advisors portfolio manager facing insider trading charges, has switched lawyers, replacing Charles A. Stillman of Stillman & Friedman with Richard M. Strassberg of Goodwin Procter.

headline.main: Martoma, Former SAC Employee, Changes Lawyers in Insider Case
headline.print_headline: A Former Manager at SAC Changes Defense Lawyers
